bibl.title: A Demotic Coffin Inscription: Berlin Äg. Inv. 7227.
Egyptian Religion: The Last Thousand Years. Studies Dedicated to the Memory of Jan Quaegebeur. Part I
bibl.author: SMITH, Mark

bibl.note: Part of the lid of a coffin acquired in Giza. Inscriptions in demotic and in Greek, first century B.C.
SMITH Mark, A Demotic Coffin Inscription: Berlin Äg. Inv. 7227.

Willy CLARYSSE, Antoon SCHOORS and Harco WILLEMS (Edd.), Egyptian Religion: The Last Thousand Years. Studies Dedicated to the Memory of Jan Quaegebeur. Part I = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 84 (Leuven, 1998) pp. 425-439, 1 pl.
